result.name: accommodation-stock-audit
result.notes:
Official statistic refreshed every second year - a compilation of accommodation stock information (serviced and non-serviced). England results are combined with those from other tourist boards to create a UK-level return for Eurostat.  Some variation in timelines, but generally published at the end of every second calendar year (next update 2014).

Current deliverables are available at http://www.visitengland.org/insight-statistics/major-tourism-surveys/accommodations/AccommodationStock/
result.title: Accommodation Stock Audit

extras.value: Results are currently provided in the format of short (pdf) reports and an excel analysis of stock levels by local authority. The excel file could be converted to csv for greater accessibility, but we consider that there are commercial sensitivities around publishing detailed stock information about individual accommodation businesses.
